ja485:6.1: Osīdi → osadhi (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | osaṭṭhi (mr) | osati (abhinavaṭīkā) | osīdati (?), dukkhaṃ → dukkhaṃ me (bj, pts1)
ja485:8.1: Vassamiva sare pāde → vassaṃva sare pāde (bj) | vassaṃva sare pabbatapāde (pts1)
ja485:9.1: Pāpo khosi → pāposi kho (bj) | pāpo kho (s2, s3, pts1)
ja485:12.4: mayha kāmā hi → mayhaṃ kāmāhi (s2, s3) | mayhaṃ kāmā (mr)
ja485:17.2: Tā ca giriguhāyo tatheva tiṭṭhanti →  tā ca giriguhāyo (sī1, syā2, syā3, pā1)
ja485:29.1: Vande te → te pāde (bj, s3), ayirabrahme → ayyire brahme (mr)
